letters.description: Gather comprehensive patient history, including lifestyle, environmental factors, and emotional well-being, using functional medicine principles.
Identify imbalances and root causes of dysfunction through targeted testing and in-depth analysis of interconnected physiological systems.
Develop a customized treatment plan incorporating diet, lifestyle modifications, targeted supplementation, and mind-body techniques.
Guide patients in integrating healthy habits into their daily lives, fostering self-efficacy and long-term adherence to the plan.
Provide ongoing support, monitor progress, and adjust the plan as needed to ensure sustained health improvements and prevent recurrence.
